sub_title: Senior advisor at the Budget Inspectorate, Ministry of Finance (NL)

education.field_of_study: International Relations and Affairs (Leergang Buitenlandse Betrekkingen)

projects.title: Introducing Performance Audit in the Chamber of Accounts
projects.description: Development and organisation of a 10-day study tour on Performance Auditing for 9 key staff in the Chamber of Accounts of Azerbaijan. The tour included visits to the UK National Audit Office, Audit Scotland and the National Audit Office in the Netherlands.

projects.title: MATRA Patrol PFM Training

contributors.headline: Senior advisor at the Budget Inspectorate, Ministry of Finance (NL)

projects.title: Independent Final Evaluation of the Public Finance for Development Programme (UNDP)
projects.description:
Final Evaluation of the Public Finance for Development Programme: “Strengthening Public Finance capacities in the Western Balkans and the Commonwealth of Independent States”, a programme financed by the Slovak Government and implemented by UNDP. Evaluation was focused on the 5 OECD evaluation criteria: relevance, effectiveness, efficiency, impact and sustainability. 
I supported the Team Leader of this evaluation with data collection, interpretation and analysis of data, and provided support in the elaboration of project evaluation sheets for individual selected interventions.

contributors.headline: Senior advisor at the Budget Inspectorate, Ministry of Finance (NL)

projects.title: Summative Evaluation of the Afghanistan Programme (CIDA)
projects.description: Assessment of the Afghanistan Program of the Canadian International Development Agency (CIDA) for the period from 2004-05 to 2010-11. Summative evaluation of CIDA's Afghanistan programme in terms of the following six criteria: relevance, coherence, performance (effectiveness, efficiency, and economy), sustainability, management principles/Paris declaration, and crosscutting issues. As support to the core evaluation team, I was responsible for the project assessment forms, analysing the documents of 25 signature projects of CIDA in Afghanistan, including projects on Human Rights. Moreover, data analysis and converting bulks of data into readable charts.

projects.title: Public Financial Management Support Programme Pakistan
projects.description: OPM (lead) and Ecorys are carrying out an ambitious 5-year PFM Support Programme in Pakistan. I was the project manager at Ecorys' side.

projects.title: Training courses PFM
projects.description: Ecorys provided training courses to staff of the Australian Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade and its High Commissions in the Pacific region on PFM (introduction to PFM, PFM reform, budget analysis and political economy of PFM).

contributors.headline: Senior advisor at the Budget Inspectorate, Ministry of Finance (NL)

projects.title: Evaluation of Delegated Cooperation
projects.description:
This large development effectiveness evaluation of the European Union´s Delegated Cooperation aid delivery mechanism is part of DEVCO´s evaluation programme and is aimed at contributing to accountability in the use of EU funds and to the improvement of EU policies and practices through the incorporation of lessons learnt. 
I joined the team after the inception phase. As member of the evaluation team, I am responsible for data collection, portfolio analysis, and preparation of the case studies. I was one of the team members for the field mission to Palestine in April 2016, which was one of the ten case studies.

contributors.headline: Senior advisor at the Budget Inspectorate, Ministry of Finance (NL)

projects.title: Support to National Audit Office Tanzania
projects.description: Support to the implementing team in Tanzania on the development of a revised M&E system for the National Audit Office of Tanzania. Mission to Tanzania in January 2015 to contribute to development of M&E approach.

contributors.headline: Senior advisor at the Budget Inspectorate, Ministry of Finance (NL)

projects.title: Evaluation of SECO Tax and Development portfolio
projects.description: Independent evaluation of SECO’s activities in the field of tax and development. As Junior Evaluator in the team, I provided assistance to development of evaluation methodology, desk study and organisation of case studies to Mozambique and Ghana, and conducted with the tax expert the case study in Peru.

contributors.headline: Senior advisor at the Budget Inspectorate, Ministry of Finance (NL)

projects.title: Evaluation of the Danish Engagement in Palestine
projects.description: As Junior Evaluator, my task included the desk study for 6 key projects in the evaluation of Danish assistance to Palestine in the area of Human Rights and Local Development.

contributors.headline: Senior advisor at the Budget Inspectorate, Ministry of Finance (NL)

projects.title: Mid-term Review of the IMF Middle East Regional Technical Assistance Center (METAC)
projects.description: METAC is one of the nine Regional Technical Assistance Centers established to help recipient countries in strengthening human and institutional capacity to design and implement sound macroeconomic and financial policies that promote growth and reduce poverty. METAC serves ten countries in the Middle East. The objective of the evaluation is to assess the extent to which METAC is achieving its objectives efficiently and effectively and whether TA delivered is sustainable. As Junior Evaluator, my main tasks included: organization of the field work, document and data analysis, survey design and development, data processing and survey reporting and preparation of technical annexes.

contributors.headline: Senior advisor at the Budget Inspectorate, Ministry of Finance (NL)

projects.title: International Research by Students Programme
projects.description:
Programme of the students' association of International Relations and International Organization Clio. Research done on behalf of the party bureau of the Green Left Party. 
Title: The road to Copenhagen: the influence of the economical effects of climate change on the negotiation positions. (Original title: De weg naar Kopenhagen: de invloed van de economische effecten van klimaatverandering op de onderhandelingsposities).

courses.name: Language course Spanish in Salamanca and Sevilla, 2006 (5 months)

profile_positions.description:
I worked for the Dutch recertification team based at one of BNP's CIB offices in
Lisbon. Responsible for periodic review of commercial corporates against
AML-CFT regulations. = This included applying Know Your Client (KYC) procedures as well as regulatory checks on FATCA/AEOI compliance.
profile_positions.title: Due Diligence Officer / KYC analyst
International Development Consultant

profile_positions.description: As a research assistant for two divisions in Ecorys working on the international development market, I was mainly involved in large acquisition projects and provision of research assistance to evaluations of development programmes.
profile_positions.title: Research Assistant Finance and Accountability Unit, and Business Development Department

profile_positions.description: Research to opportunities for development of SMEs in Ghana and Suriname. Short assignment in which I made a market analysis based on interviews and document analysis. It resulted in two country reports that provided an overview of main opportunities for small entrepreneurs in Ghana and Suriname.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Researcher

profile_positions.description: Intern at the Netherlands Embassy in New Zealand, at the economic department. I was responsible for market analysis of sectors of interest for Dutch enterpreneurs, drafting news articles and attending business and trade events. I mainly focused on agricultural cooperation, e.g. exchange of practices to reduce greenhouse gas emissions. I interviewed various stakeholders in the agricultural sector and wrote several sector reports, indicating chances and opportunities. I was also involved in the setup of cooperation between the Rabobank and the Embassy.
profile_positions.title: Intern at the Economic Department
